title: The Warriors Are Up Against the Injury Bug As Well As the Raptors | The Mismatch
description:
The undermanned Golden State Warriors managed to take Game 2 from the Raptors in Toronto; as the series shifts to Oakland, will they be able to replicate that success (0:51)? Plus: With the draft approaching in two weeks’ time, which sleepers could rise above the fray (38:54)?
Hosts: Chris Vernon, Kevin O’Connor

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
